Posts.EditableText: Ok, two things. First, is there any possible way to add more colors to the game, besides the red/green/black/yellow/white originals? And, how do I change the way entering a room is displayed. What I mean is, I know how to make the room display something other than "You are in the Bedroom," but I want to display something else for objects, other than, "There is MILK in the room." Can that be done? Thanks

Posts.EditableText: You can use RRGGBB values (as you would in HTML) by prefixing them with &H in a foreground or background command or tag. For example in ASL, [code:2w20zf12] foreground <&HFF0000> [/code:2w20zf12] is red. You can specify values in hexadecimal between 00 and FF. You can completely customise room descriptions - see "How to Customise Room Descriptions" in the help file or at http://www.axeuk.com/quest/developer/as ... ptions.htm
